channel.title: Help with a few things?
channel.description:
I was wondering if it was possible to change how invisible you become when you use the ghost emote. What does the command ::hide do exactly? It doesnt seem to work for my server.
I want to make a command that will cloak you so you can just barely see a blur... Kinda like with the ghost emote and wearing ghostly robes, just without your face showing. Can anyone help me on this? If possible? :confused:[br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 11:34:59 PM[/size][hr]... :|[br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2007, 12:06:38 AM[/size][hr],,, (-_-) ,,, <waits>

item.title: Help with a few things?
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

Don’t spam, I gave you an answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a few things?
item.dc:creator: @Muffinator Muffinator
item.description:
@Muffinator wrote:

???!?!??!???!!!?!?!!!

Explodes from waiting too long, casuing nuclear winter destroying every living organism on the planet and in the universe!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a few things?
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

You can’t make yourself certain levels on invisibility. ::Hide Just sets your player appearance to -100, which isn’t an appearance, therefore making you “invisible”.

Read full topic
